entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
